It's a great product but i have  issue to use memory stick on it. The projector can not play the file. I convert my file to AVI and it still no play.

Being new to 3D projection, I relied on my son for his advice since he already owns a Panasonic PT-AE 8000U 3D projector. He had his installed by professionals so his help was a little limited as to set up etc. I was "assigned" a rep. and herein lies the "but" above. After ordering the projector, she could have contacted me and offered advice about 3D Blu-Ray players available and other accessories available. Instead, I had to research and go elsewhere to purchase my Samsung H-6500 Smart 3D Blu-Ray player and she could have queried my installation. My installation is in an enclosed housing which requires an IR extender accessory made by Panasonic. Even though the accessory is listed in the Panasonic instructions, I could not locate in in your web site. Instead, I had to order it from a different company. Even though the rep's help would have been unsolicited to some degree, it could have saved me some time and frustration in set up.
Good customer service, once you can get ahold of them. Competitive pricing, quick delivery, and knowledgeable staff. Would recommend.

Review.Titre: Absorb they online taxes just like all…
Review.Contenu: Absorb they online taxes just like all the other online companies have done and not depend on the customers to have to pay for it
Sometimes not clear enough with some purchases.   You buy and then they take too mucho to send you.   But in general very nice people...

Review.Titre: We were able to get our questions…
Review.Contenu: We were able to get our questions answered and needs met in a professional way, and stay within our budget parameters.
Was not what I ordered but what I ordered was on back log. Got what I needed at a lower price on time. Great job thanks for your help.

Initially, I bought the projector I wanted from Amazon.  It came in 2 days and performed beyond my expectations.  Shortly after I had buyer's remorse as I found out PP offered the same projector without sales tax and a $50 Visa gift card.  That was going to be a $90 savings that made it worth the while to shop at PP.  The shipping time was from PP was over a week, but I wasn't in a hurry.  My only disappointment with the whole experience with PP was the projector was not shipped in a secondary box like Amazon did.  Not only does this offer more protection for a expensive piece of electronics but it prevents prying eyes from seeing what I ordered.  The package was delivered by FedEX and was left on my doorstep, no signature required as I was led to believe.  My wife postponed running errands on the delivery day specifically to sign for the package, that didn't require it.  Overall I would order from PP again if they continued to offer the best price and provided more security in shipping their products.  Thanks

Review.Titre: Decent treatment and very little friction.
Review.Contenu: Buying a projector was a huge investment for me and after lots of studying, price comparing, and review reading I finally settled on a product that fit my needs. The information and price offered by the Projector People was second to none. The communication and shipping were great. My projector connected and was perfect in less than 10 minutes after I opened it. My only negative experience was my unavoidable concern that I wouldn't be able to return the projector if there was a small problem or it didn't fit my needs right. I was told by the company that if there were any problems I would have a very short window of return and a long process of them trying to fix any problems I may have rather than refunding me. I understand it's a business and refunds mean lost money, but I am still very concerned that if a problem arises that can't be hashed out over a phone call I will be out of luck. There have been no problems thus far though and I am happy with the quality I have received from this company.
I think PP know the product better than big box stores - but I prefer to have a physical location to return product if needed.
Product and Service was great. I did have to go back and order the universal bracket kit. All in all I have no complaints.
Todd supplied excellent customer service and advice. Very happy with purchase. They handled the a return smoothly. Thanks!
Good company to deal with. Todd is the best in customer service and always willing to help take care of any issues.
Great prices and fast shipping. But could not reach customer service people. Always going to voicemail.
Knowledgeable, friendly and willing to help along with fair pricing what more could you need or ask for
Very helpful sales reps. There was some confusion with the order but was resolved reasonably well.

Review.Titre: They took the time to make it right
Review.Contenu: Below is my original review of Projector People based on my experience ordering a projector from them. See below for the update.------------------------------------------------------------Ordered an Epson projector from them on 10/11/2015. Credit card was charged instantly. Their site showed the item as "In stock - ships within 24 hours". 3 days later, still no shipment ackowledgement. I emailed their customer service and got "I'm sorry, the product is not in stock due to high demand, but we placed the order with Epson to have shipped direct to you and you should have within a week". Week and a half later, still nothing. Check ProjectorPeople.com website and it shows "In stock - ships within 24 hours". I email asking if mine has shipped? Response "We received in about 5 units last week but Epson was supposed to ship yours direct to you. Epson didn't ship your order yet. They are telling me now Mid-November.". ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The same day of posting the above, I was contacted and assured the projector would be overnighted and delivered the following day. It is the following day, and the projector did arrive as promised.
Good customer service. Shipping took longer than expected, but otherwise great experience.
Item was lowest price on the web at time of purchase and shipped on time. No hassle service.

Review.Titre: When we called to inquire about…
Review.Contenu: When we called to inquire about projectors, our sales rep was extremely knowledge and listened to our needs before making a recommendation.  What he recommended was a great value and met the needs of our ministry.

Carmen was excellent! I told her about some of the issues I had with other “professionals” in the A/V business and she recommended that I stretch my budget and go for the LS11000. Then she told me it was going on sale over that weekend. So, I kept checking, like a little kid looking for Santa Claus and finally Sunday afternoon the price dropped and I snapped one up.Wow what a great projector too! Carmen was right!Thanks Carmen!

The sales associate was personable, well-informed and willing to answer all questions before a decision to purchase was made. The price for the product ultimately obtained was very competitive. A five star experience in every way.  Thank You!
Website was easy to use to purchase, projector came on time, no issues, Projector works great.

Carmen is amazing! She was able to give me several projectors to choose from that would suit our needs. There was absolutely NO pressure at all to make a purchase. The projector is exactly what we need and was delivered in a timely manner. Installation was a breeze!

I bought a lamp, but the one I received was broken. The Customer Service Representative  that handled my case was Lauri P.. She did an outstanding job in resolving my problem. Communications over the phone and by email were exceptional. I wish that all representatives were like her. And Rich M., the guy that sold me the projector and all accessories henceforth, did a great job as well.Thanks!

The experience was excellent! Sarah helped us decide what projector was right for our venue and made sure that we had the correct lens. The shipping and payment process was smooth, and we have successfully installed the recommended product. We are amazed at the quality and the great price! Thank you so much!

hi Deanna was very sweet kind helpful and she went beyond and made sure that i got what i paid for she was the greatest if i had to buy something else here i would only go throw her no one else i only trust her thank you

Worked with us to utilize a PO system paid by grant funding through a 3rd party which is always a mess. Turns out, it was near the last unit in stock and the sales rep put a reserve on it for us till our paperwork could get a chance to get off the ground. So grateful for the consideration, oh and the projector is fantastic.

Review.Titre: We needed to replace a projector for…
Review.Contenu: We needed to replace a projector for our small 19th century church. We had done business with them 12 years earlier.  They were able to find our original transaction and help us with a replacement that works perfectly for our needs. Friendly, helpful, and professional.

Awesome projector. But... Lately, I've notice a kind of shimmering distortion in movies whenever the camera pans. Kind of like a fun house mirror. Not sure if it's the projector itself or the screen, which is a pull-down. Would be thankful for any ideas/insights.

I bought my first projector from PP nearly 16 years ago and had a good experience with them at the time. I was looking to upgrade and was pleased to find that my original rep Karmen was still with the company. She took time to answer my questions and helped me make sure I was getting the right projector.

After more than 10 years, two projectors, projector mounts, an ALR screen and a lot of replacement bulbs, I wouldn't go anywhere else. Fair prices and the best, most knowledgeable people will help make your home theater experience a great one as well. Highly recommended. Buy it, watch it, eat more popcorn - it's all a joy.Cheers!

Review.Titre: Working with the staff was great
Review.Contenu: Working with the staff was great, but the product which is 4K does not have enough Lumens to show the precise view of the Golf Course graphics in a Golf Simulator. Also, the throw is 13’ minimum to fit a 9’x13’ screen which means you need a lot of space to build around this limitation.

Review.Titre: We always need help in purchasing a new…
Review.Contenu: We always need help in purchasing a new projector for our church. Your staff has always supplied the technical support that we need and always has replied quickly to our questions and concerns. Products and our needs are constantly changing so we go to companies like you to help us make the right purchases.  Rich Morgan was the last person who helped us and he was great - thank you.

Review.Titre: Well the service is okay despite some…
Review.Contenu: Well the service is okay despite some delays with the hotline. Good products but great customer service, the only challenge is that there’s need for more advertisements. I loved most of the items and they are user friendly too. I give it a 5 star ⭐️ rating.

Review.Titre: Absolutely get people and great products.
Review.Contenu: Absolutely get people and great products.  I had a difficult problem with a tremendously long throw.   The individual who help me was gave me options and was greatly helpful.

Review.Contenu: Being able to actually talk to someone who knows about aspect ratios and thrown ratios and lumensand all the features is pretty nice. Plus they gave me a plethora of options which really helped me find just the right projector for my application.  Projectors are expensive so you want to get it right the first time.

Review.Titre: My experience with Projector People is…Fantastic!
Review.Contenu: My experience with Projector People is made great because of Sarah Buss-Fonk, our sales rep. She's the best. She's always quick to respond and gets us the necessary information.  She even replies to my emails when she's on vacation. She routinely keeps us up to date with product information.

Review.Contenu: Aside from having great prices and a wide selection of products, their people know their products! I've been dealing with them for probably 10 years, and know that if I have a specific need for some feature I need or some problem I need to resolve, they will refer me to the best solution at the best price.

Review.Titre: Item in stock & shipped reasonably promptly…
Review.Contenu: Item was in stock and shipped reasonably promptly.  Projector works well although I note that the focus seems to drift slightly for the first few minutes of operation. Most people would not notice in a conference room setting on a 85" (diagonal) screen like we are using.

I appreciated the sales person's expertise and help in selecting the products I wanted to purchase for our church. The projector I ordered was delivered very timely and was just what we needed. The Screen was shipped in a timely manner but lost by the carrier for three weeks. Fortunately it finally arrived in good condition and also worked out to be a perfect match for our venue.

Review.Titre: My BenQ MW632ST Projector is Amazing!
Review.Contenu: I am more than pleased with my recent BenQ MW632ST projector purchase!  I love the short throw, which allows me to get a 120" screen from just 7 feet away!  The clarity and brightness are much better than any other projector I've tried in this price range plus the buying experience through Projector People was amazing!  They really care about their customers and it shows.  Shipping was quick, plus they gave updates on the order status and followed up with me to ensure I received everything and was satisfied.  I look forward to future purchases that will definitely be through them!
fast, friendly servic e& fair prices
Prompt and  knowledgeable sales professionals

Review.Titre: Very helpful in making sure I knew…

This short throw super bright projector was exactly what we needed for our 100+ ballroom-sized meetings. Utilized a rescreen projection and normal room light, the images were clear and vivid. Great selection and expertise has had me coming back for nearly a decade. Great retailer!

I highly recommend Projector people. They are REAL people who are really helpful.I have made two purchases from Carmen and she is wonderful. She does her best to help you select the right product, is timely and goes the extra mile. 10/10 customer service and good prices.

We upgraded our system at church. My sales advisor helped me with options and making a decision while staying within our budget. He assured me that we would be very pleased with the equipment upgrade and he was absolutely correct. The service was also great and these days, that goes a long way. Thank you Projector People!

A company rep. contacted me to confirm purchase (since it was a relatively high cost item), and informed me of the stock delay.  Shortly have re-stocking, they informed me of the delivery.  They had great communication and promptly answered any questions I had.  Highly recommend.
Sarah was very helpful. Also I really appreciated all the informative articles that you have to help understand how to get the best projector.

Review.Titre: My sales rep was so helpful and help…
Review.Contenu: My sales rep was so helpful and help find ways to make our purchase more affordable for our church. This was our second time purchasing from projector people and we will be back again with our future needs.

I have bought numerous projectors over about 20 years from projector people. They consistently have outstanding service and quality products to choose from and strive to help the customer get the best product for their needs and budget. We just upgraded to a Sony laser projector for our church sanctuary and are very pleased with it.

Review.Titre: Hands down the best customer service…
Review.Contenu: Hands down the best customer service I've received in ages. After making my purchase Projector People called to verify my order and inform the item was in stock and would ship that day. Also sent me a paid invoice via email and shipping confirmation. My projector arrived 2 days after placing the order. I couldn't be happier with my choice to order from this company.

Review.Contenu: Very knowledgeable and answered several of my questions. Went above and beyond to keep me updated on expected shipping date and updates due to item I purchased was not currently in stock which zi was aware of when I purchased. Could not be happier with the product or choosing to buy from The Projector People.
Great knowledge. The right price. The bonus is your tech support facilitated an easy discussion with Sony so that the projector can be controlled over IP.  Very satisfyand happy purchase.

I wanted to buy new and from an authorized dealer. After the purchase, which I received in a few days, I got a call to make sure that if I had any questions to please call. The first time I had ordered something online and received a communication back from a human being.  Fantastic.
Carmen Aiken has been our rep for years and continues to provide excellent customer service. Definitely an asset to your company. Also, solid products and pricing. Thank you!

What made the experience great was the quick follow-up to my order.  I got a phone call from a very pleasant person to verify the details of the order, and they even upgraded my shipping for a quicker delivery.  That's after the sale was made and without me making a request.  I appreciate their interest and efforts toward going above and beyond to create customer satisfaction.  I'm glad that I near-randomly chose them when I ordered my new projector online.  I didn't know them then, but they have since earned my loyalty as a customer and I highly recommend them.

I was looking for advise and Rich was friendly and very helpful on the phone.  He spent the time to really explain things and point me in the right direction.  Rich did not hesitate to give explain things despite my little to zero knowledge of projectors.

Ken Wright!!Unfortunately, the projector I received did not work out of the box.  It was giving a lamp failure error.  Ken worked with me and the vendor to get my projector returned and another sent out which worked perfectly.  Really appreciate all his support!’

Review.Titre: Pleased with the entire process of getting our new projector
Review.Contenu: Our purchase of a projector for our church was a great experience through projectorpeople.com. I knew the projector I wanted and was able to get a quick quote from the sales rep. The order process was quick and easy and before I knew it our projector had arrived - faster than I had figured. Very happy with the service and the projector we received.

Review.Contenu: They did a great job on Delivery. the projector came in time for installation and it was all brand new compare to some other companies that ships open box products. They confirm orders before they ship and they are very responsive to calls.

Still finishing the assembly of my home theater, but I am very happy with how I was treated by the Projector People. I would buy from them again!

I bought all my Home Theater equipment from Projector People and have had no issues the the equipment they recommended.  I recently wanted to upgrade to 4K. They set me up again.  No disappointment.  Would recommend them for any of your electronic needs.

My 5-star rating of Projector People is due, first and foremost, to the excellent customer service from Sarah Fonk.  She was very responsive to my requests for multiple quotes and answered my technical questions quickly and knowledgably. Also, your price for the projector I bought this time was very competitive.

Was truly the best experience.  I ordered one thing which I thought I need for our church. They called and asked a bunch of questions.  I originally ordered something that would not work in our environment.  They next day they shipped the perfect project.  Could not have been happier with the product or service.

Review.Titre: I called to ask questions and the rep…
Review.Contenu: I called to ask questions and the rep was extremely knowledgeable.  He was exactly what I needed!

I talked with the company to make sure I was ordering the right bulb for my Epson projector.  The gentleman I spoke with was most knowledgeable.  The order came fast and is a great bulb.  Our projector was also purchased through the company. Great company and great to do business with them.

Review.Titre: The service tech was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: The service tech was very helpful and knowledgeable. They were able to provide different options to fit my needs.

My teachers love the new projector for their classroom. As director, I am so happy it surpassed the Epson that everyone fought over. Best of all was the customer service over the phone. They actually pick up and return calls within a day. No one does that anymore!

Projector People's Service is definitely recommended! I've received a fantastic signature on every item I've submitted in return. They are excellent at returning your items safely as well. My item was obviously carefully packaged. I'll soon use the service once more!

They answered all my questions and were able to help me determine a great projector for my application.  Also, when a monitor I ordered went out of stock they quickly found its replacement and quickly got it to me.
Carmen was the BEST!!!! Answers the phone on each of my calls and returns emails promptly! Her customer service skills are exceptional. Give Carmen a raise!!!!! Thanks Carmen and Projector People!

Review.Titre: Outstanding Sales People and Customer Service!
Review.Contenu: Sarah was great at answering my many questions and guiding me towards the correct purchase!  I could not be happier with Project People, their products and their support!
fast response to solve problems, truly interested in helping and checking back to be sure everything is ok

It these times, it hard to get any order that has not been delayed due to backlogs and Covid related issues.  The Projector People were able to find the product I needed and get is shipped to me within a few weeks compared to other places it would have taken months for my order to arrive.  I needed the product ASAP and the delivered big time.  Any future needs I have, I will return to them.  Great people, Great service.

Review.Titre: I was extremely impressed and pleased…
Review.Contenu: I was extremely impressed and pleased with every aspect of your services. The information from the first conversation over the phone to the honesty and help of ordering the right equipment needed for our church! Thank you!
Projector people recommended the perfect product for our purpose and got back to us when we had questions. The projector we ordered was delivered when they said it would be.  What more can one ask?

Review.Titre: I have been using this projector for…
Review.Contenu: I have been using this projector for about a month. I really like the sound quality, brightness and resolution. Start up time is slow but after that it works fine. The problem is that it doesn't have an HDMI port, so you'll need to buy an adapter.

Review.Titre: I have had the 410 for approx 18 months
Review.Contenu: I have had the 410 for approx. 18 months and have generally watched movies and most in 3D but not all. The picture is suburb and the brightness is excellent, view it on a 110 screen and it's like being at a theater with my surround system.

Review.Titre: I was pleasantly surprised with the…
Review.Contenu: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and expedient responses I received from each person that I contacted.  The process was as simple and easy as one could ever hope for when ordering items.
I explained that the problem was that my DLP projector would render yellow as brown. As color is important in my application Rich Morgan suggested that I buy a laser projector. It is perfect!
Outstanding customer service.  Listened to my needs and confirmed that the projector I was looking at would fill that need and express shipped it so I was ready to work on Monday.

Review.Titre: Great place to find all your options.
Review.Contenu: Very helpful and informative about what projector was good for me based on my room size and projection distance.  Would highly recommend!
Unfortunately the projector I ordered didn’t have the 2D to 3D conversion feature I thought it would have. So a return was arranged. Carmen was very helpful in both the sale and return.
Fair price. Excellent respons time. Expert sales reps. Sarah gets the highest marks for customer service@

I stumbled on this company while searching for some way to get a level of detailed info regarding specific projectors. It was getting ridiculously hard to find anyone to talk to who could help me make the leap from amateur to a quality device. Finding someone knowledgeable to help me navigate to making the 'right' purchase was what I was striving for and my 1st phone call to this company was all I needed to tell me I had made the right decision. My sales associate Rich simply the best! A great listener, very informative...very friendly and was able to put me in the right direction to exactly what I needed. I ended up purchasing an Epson 3800. While there were a couple models a step up from that which were recommended, due to the size of those units and the limitations of my placement, the 3800 was the ideal choice and wow....what a difference from the budget projector I had been using for the past 6 months. That Epson may end up being one of the best upgrades I've ever made! After I finished ceiling mounting it...I called Rich with a follow up comment about how great the picture looked and he was even able to provide valuable info which helped me tweak the machine to meet a specific ratio issue I was having getting it to fit my screen. I love that the company provides lifetime customer support....even though I could go to Epson directly. Courteous and knowledgeable customer support from a reliable company! what more can you ask for!!! I highly recommend finding reviewers of the 3800 on YouTube to get additional pointers on best calibration. You'll want to play around a little with settings to suit your environment, but once you lock in your settings you'll be thrilled with how it delivers!!!
great projector- my second from projector people over the years - very happy with our machine

Review.Titre: Rich Morgan has been terrific helping…
